mapper.select: SELECT a.community_id as communityId, a.member_id as memberId, b.title, (select name from menu where id = b.menu_id) as menuName, a.register_time as date FROM com_like a LEFT JOIN community b on a.community_id = b.id and a.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.register_time desc LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM com_like where member_id = #{memberId}
